title: It makes no sense why my ping is so high in League of Legends.
body: I live in Los Angeles. Why am I getting pings of 79 and upward?  I look at all these streams of people who live around Los Angeles and their pings are between 50 and 70.   Can someone please explain?

replies.body:
There are so many different things that factor into the health of your connection. It could be what ISP you're using, or due to the combination of network settings you currently have. It could also simply be the physical router you're using believe it or not. 

Check out this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a few quick and easy troubleshooting steps. Do pay extra attention to port forwarding and how to configure your DNS. Let me know how that works, and if needed we can dig a little deeper.
